meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Sean Priest Daniel Cohen Paul Wampler Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6083.

div.div: IBM Challenge mini-documentary: "What is a Grand Challenge?"

td.p: Sean Priest, a high school vice principal from San Francisco, California
Daniel Cohen, an actor from Astoria, New York
Paul Wampler, a web programmer from Knoxville, Tennessee (whose 2-day cash winnings total $33,401)

tr.td: MUSICAL INSTRUMENTS
OSCAR-WINNING ROLES
WHAT'S IN YOUR "C"LOSET?
(Alex: Each correct response will begin with the letter "C".)
THE CONSTITUTION
SURFIN' USB
(Alex: And finally, words invented for a particular occasion...)
NONCE WORDS

tr.td: Paul
Daniel
Sean
(lock game)

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: [Revealing Paul\'s response] Were you referring to the party or yourself on this clue?)
(Paul: On this clue, myself.)
SeanWhat is the Federalist party?
$1,547
DanielWhat is the Federalist Party?
$399
PaulWhat is the [no crossed out] no-nothing party?
$400
the Federalist Party')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', 'Only 1 U.S. president represented this party, & he said, "I dread... a division of the republic into 2 great parties"')

tr.td: POLITICAL PARTIES
Only 1 U.S. president represented this party, & he said, "I dread... a division of the republic into 2 great parties"
Paul
Daniel
Sean
3-day champion: $50,401
2nd place: $2,000
3rd place: $1,000
Paul
Daniel
Sean

25 R,
4 W
(including 1 DD)

13 R,
3 W
(including 2 DDs)

7 R,
2 W
